title: New: My Tiger My Timing – Endless Summer
body:
Our good friends, **My Tiger My Timing**, have announced the release of their new single ‘**Endless Summer**‘.

 [Endless Summer](http://soundcloud.com/mytigermytiming/endless-summer) by [mytigermytiming](http://soundcloud.com/mytigermytiming)

Released a week before their performance at **Glastonbury Festival**, **Endless Summer** stands to forge itself into your summer playlist with upbeat, jangly guitars and an anthemic rhythm guaranteed to get you dancing.

**My Tiger My Timing** were also kind enough to contribute a cover of **Katy Perry**‘s **California Gurls** for our Covers Compilation that you can find **[here!](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7835-citr-and-youth-music-present)**
